articles.title: 'Manjummel Boys' director Chidambaram's father bashes writer Jeyamohan on social media! - Tamil News - Telugu Cinema - IndiaGlitz
articles.description: Renowned writer Jeyamohan courted controversy by slamming 'Manjummel Boys' and Malayalis in his social media post. Director Chidambaram's father responded to him on social media.

articles.description: Priyanka Chahar Choudhary took to her Instagram stories to take a dig at media portals for spreading the rumours of her marriage with Ankit Gupta.
